Keywords: Future , Past , Soldier , Warrior , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Nathan Summers
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Characters
BODYSLIDE BY...: Phasing/Teleport, Passenger: 2. // FREE: If Cable has two action tokens, Move.
MOM! IS IT COOL IF I TRADE WITH RAZA?: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire and a standard attack power they can use. Until your next turn, Cable can use the chosen power and the chosen character can't use that power.
I GAVE THEM A GIFT... ONE OF MY FAVORITE GRENADES: Enhancement. // POWER: Make a range attack, and all other characters adjacent to the original target also become targets. Hit characters are dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage and modify attack -2 until your next turn.

Comments
December 1, 2020
SpooderNoob892
I think his play style is going to revolve around keeping him in hindering behind a wall of characters to snipe the opposition with his 7 range and IT: Hindering/Characters. He has such strong attack potential from a wide range, so it is pretty balanced that he only has toughness. (We also have to keep in mind that he is very mobile with phasing and a free move, and also can use prob defensively)
November 25, 2020
Emtemss
Arguably the best Cable they've yet made at this point cost. I like seeing the little nods to each past version in some fashion. It feels like that toughness will really be his weakest point, as even though his dial is rather long for today's game, his base stats are pretty weak after even one moderate hit. Still very useful, and dangerous if left unattended, but not so terrifying. Love the sculpt, definetly became my top want from the set for sure.
